hero.title: MN Taco Bell 25K
hero.subtitle: A unique running race celebrating Taco Bell, fitness, and camaraderie
hero.description: Join runners from across Minnesota for an unforgettable 25-kilometer experience that combines the thrill of racing with the joy of tacos. Whether you're a seasoned athlete or just here for the fun, this event brings together community, fitness, and flavor in one epic day.

spiceFormats.name: Mild
spiceFormats.description: Perfect for beginners or those who want to enjoy a leisurely pace. Includes Taco Bell breakfast before the run!
spiceFormats.whoItsFor: First-time runners, families, and taco enthusiasts
spiceFormats.nutrition: Light and energizing - perfect morning fuel

spiceFormats.name: Hot
spiceFormats.description: A moderate challenge for experienced runners. Post-race feast with signature Taco Bell menu items!
spiceFormats.whoItsFor: Regular runners looking for a fun challenge

spiceFormats.name: Diablo
spiceFormats.description: The ultimate test - our full 25K course through scenic Minnesota. Includes premium Taco Bell experience and swag!

schedule.title: Race Day Schedule
schedule.description: Everything you need to know for race day

location.title: Location & Parking
location.description: Find us at the heart of Minneapolis

updates.title: Latest Updates
updates.description: Stay informed with the latest race news
